rule: If "CantAnswer" is chosen as the output, it must signify the chatbot was completely unable to process or make a determination for any unspecified reason.
complianceText:
The chatbot outputs "CC: Error". The description asks for a part-of-speech tag, and lists possible tags. The output includes “CC” which is a valid tag. However, it also includes “Error” which is not a valid tag according to the description, nor is it one of the allowed return values.
ERR
